column4: hey guys how can i see what dns server my box is looking at. its headless so its needs to be in the shell
cat: /etc/resolve.conf: No such file or directory
add a line "nameserver <ipaddress>", do you currently have DNS resolution?
the tech support sent me a list of 5 resolvers
the format is "nameserver IP1" new line "nameserver IP2" etc.
install "vim" - the default vi is terrible regarding arrow keys etc.
it has nothing to do with what your talking about
no worries glad to see you trying to help
